DOC.HEAD: Prices Rise
Eds: New throughout
DOC.TEXT: Stocks rose Monday in moderate trading, recovering partly from losses in the previous session. The Financial-Times Stock Exchange 100-share index ended the day 13.8 points or 0.59 percent higher at 2,358.5. The Financial Times 30-share index gained 12.8 points to close at 1,864.5. The Financial Times 500-share index rose 6.97 points to 1,280.94. Volume totaled 524.4 million shares, up from 444.9 million shares Friday.
